snippet: CAPORASO--Susan, on May 18, 2016 of Forest Hills, NY. Beloved sister of Barbara Soldano and Ann Stein (Lee). Also survived by many loving nieces and nephews. A Memorial Mass will be held at Our Lady of Mercy Church in Forest Hills on Wednesday, May 25, 2016 at 9:45am. There will be a private interment following the Mass at Good Ground Cemetery in Hampton Bays, NY. Donations in lieu of flowers may be made in Susan's memory to Saint Jude Children's Research Hospital. 1/3
